definition[0]: all the letters received by an important person, television programme etc on a particular occasion
example[0]: We’ve had an enormous postbag on the recent programme changes.
definition[1]: a bag for carrying letters, used by the person who delivers them
definition[2]: all the letters received by a public person, television programme etc
example[1]: The series did not please everyone, and the TV network’s postbag was full of complaints.
